DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate treatment temozolomide child newly diagnose malignant central nervous system tumor . - Determine toxicity treatment patient . - Determine overall survival patient 18 month follow study receive treatment . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord type disease ( ependymoma v brain stem glioma v malignant glioma v ) . Patients receive oral temozolomide day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 28 day maximum 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients partial complete response may receive additional 8 course temozolomide follow radiotherapy . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 100 patient ( 25 per stratum ) accrue study 24-36 month .
